name: Mad King: Prologue
description:
Welcome to the prologue version of Mad King! The prologue version will include:
  • Unique, exciting card battles
  • 30+ heroes to choose from
  • PvP mode, 2v2 mode and 5-player mode

If this sounds interested to you, please wishlist the full game!

Collect and experience heroes of different styles

Win battles, gain experience and heroes to try more hero combinations!

Cool card effects

There are 24 types of cards in the game for you to unlock, and all of them have cool visual effects for you to enjoy!

Use strategy to outwit your opponents

Will you choose to start strong and take the enemy in one turn, or will you choose to chip them down little by little? The unique mechanism of the heroes provides infinite possibilities for the game.

More strategy options for you to explore

The game offers 1v1, 2v2, and 5-player modes. - Whether you want to compete in high-intensity pvp battles, or have fun with a few friends - we got you covered!

Cross-Platform Play

Continue the adventure wherever you are! Enjoy the game on PC and mobile with the same account!

Try the game now!

Add the game to your steam wishlist now and follow us to avoid missing any updates!
